maze.logic

Class Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • maze.logic.Builder

  • public class Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class to launch game with our settings.
    Author:
    Diogo Trindade, Rui Vilares

      • setDragonMode

        public void setDragonMode(int optionD)
        Set dragon mode.
        Parameters:
        optionD - This option indicate if the dragon behaviour is Idle, random or sleep

      • setDragonSpitFire

        public void setDragonSpitFire(int optionS)
        Set dragon spit fire.
        Parameters:
        optionS - This option indicate if the dragon spit fire or not.

      • getDragonSpitFire

        public boolean getDragonSpitFire()
        Get dragon spit fire.
        Returns:
        true if the dragon spit fire, false otherwise.

      • getRandom

        public boolean getRandom()
        Get random mode.
        Returns:
        true if the random board was selected, false otherwise.

      • createBoard

        public Board createBoard()
        Function to create the board.
        Returns:
        Board with user settings.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Hero in default position or Hero in a randomly position.
